attributes.action: Change rule Britannia to our National anthem
attributes.additional_details: The Country needs something to unite us all,as hightening tensions consume the very nature of what it means to be British.This celebrates our nation while also giving us the patriotic  morale we all need.
attributes.background: This change marks significance as it expresses our National Identity, those who were born and came here alike who represent the british values proudly everyday.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
